name: Bioluminescent Forest Ambush
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Top-down tactical map: Bioluminescent Forest Ambush, 15x15 squares at 140 px per square (140 DPI), 15x15, distinct patterns for passable / impassable / difficult, collapses, rips, currents; marked clearly, multiple routes and flanking options, ramps, stairs, ledges, or contour lines, bold lines for walls/obstacles; fine lines for textures; high-contrast grid, icons only; no text labels; VTT-ready export, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., No embedded text labels; use icons and clear linework only. Reserve clean margins and text-safe areas for VTT overlays. Render grid and numeric ticks crisply; avoid stylized fonts entirely., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Top-down tactical map of Bioluminescent Forest Ambush.
revised_prompt: Envision a 15x15 grid, each square being 140 pixels large, designed in a top-down perspective. It should convey a scene of a bioluminescent forest ambush in a medieval fantasy setting. It should feature distinct passable, impassable, and difficult terrains, possibly including collapsed areas, rips, and currents. Offer multiple routes and flanking options, and possibly include features like ramps, stairs, ledges, or contour lines. Bold lines should be used for walls and obstacles, with fine lines for textures. Highlight the grid with high contrast but refrain from using text labels, instead relying on clear iconography. Maintain a colour palette consisting of deep teals, sea-greens, pearl highlights, and deep blues, drawing influence from aquatic realism, with details like subsurface caustics and bioluminescent accents. Maintain clean margins and text-safe areas for use in virtual tabletop overlays. Render the grid and numeric ticks crisply without stylized fonts. Ensure symbols and icons are meaningful or numbered, not random or garbled. Avoid elements of science fiction, modern signage, photo-realistic CGI, and anime-style drawing. Ensure the overall style is consistent, painterly, and filled with cultural coherence.
